verses.text: \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w gave|strong="H7761"\w* \w orders|strong="H2942"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* searched \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* library \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w books|strong="H5609"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w laid|strong="H7761"\w* up \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*,

\w And|strong="H4076"\w* \w there|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H4040"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w* \w in|strong="H1768"\w* \w Ecbatana|strong="H0307"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H7912"\w* castle \w in|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w province|strong="H4083"\w* \w of|strong="H4083"\w* \w Media|strong="H4076"\w*, \w a|strong="H7912"\w* book \w in|strong="H1768"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* this record \w was|strong="H4040"\w* \w written|strong="H3790"\w*.

\w In|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w first|strong="H2298"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*: \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* decreed, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w should|strong="H4430"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w place|strong="H0870"\w* \w where|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* may offer \w sacrifices|strong="H1685"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* lay \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w foundations|strong="H0787"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* may support \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w height|strong="H7314"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* threescore \w cubits|strong="H0521"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* breadth \w of|strong="H0426"\w* threescore \w cubits|strong="H0521"\w*,

\w Three|strong="H8532"\w* rows \w of|strong="H1005"\w* unpolished \w stones|strong="H0069"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w so|strong="H1768"\w* rows \w of|strong="H1005"\w* new \w timber|strong="H0636"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* charges shall \w be|strong="H5313"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* out \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1722"\w* \w also|strong="H0638"\w* \w let|strong="H0638"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* Nabuchodonosor \w took|strong="H5312"\w* out \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w brought|strong="H2987"\w* \w to|strong="H4481"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w restored|strong="H8421"\w*, \w and|strong="H1722"\w* carried back \w to|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w to|strong="H4481"\w* their \w place|strong="H0870"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w also|strong="H0638"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* placed \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3705"\w* therefore Thathanai, \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* country \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, Stharbuzanai, \w and|strong="H8370"\w* your counsellors \w the|strong="H5675"\w* Apharsachites, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, depart \w far|strong="H7352"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* them,

\w And|strong="H1005"\w* let that \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w* by \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* by their ancients, that they may build that \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* its \w place|strong="H0870"\w*.

\w I|strong="H4481"\w* also \w have|strong="H4430"\w* commanded \w what|strong="H1768"\w* must \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w done|strong="H5648"\w* \w by|strong="H7761"\w* \w those|strong="H0479"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* may \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w*, \w to|strong="H2942"\w* wit, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* chest, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w*, \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w tribute|strong="H4061"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w paid|strong="H3052"\w* \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* country \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w the|strong="H5675"\w* charges \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w diligently|strong="H0629"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w those|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w*, lest \w the|strong="H5675"\w* work \w be|strong="H0426"\w* hindered.

\w And|strong="H8065"\w* if it shall \w be|strong="H0426"\w* necessary, let calves also, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w lambs|strong="H0563"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* kids, \w for|strong="H1768"\w* holocausts \w to|strong="H3390"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, wheat, \w salt|strong="H4416"\w*, \w wine|strong="H2562"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w oil|strong="H4887"\w*, according \w to|strong="H3390"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* custom \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w priests|strong="H3549"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* them \w day|strong="H3118"\w* \w by|strong="H3549"\w* \w day|strong="H3118"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w there|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* complaint \w in|strong="H0426"\w* any thing.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* let them \w offer|strong="H7127"\w* oblations \w to|strong="H8065"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w pray|strong="H6739"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w life|strong="H2417"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w children|strong="H1123"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0606"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* have \w made|strong="H5648"\w* \w a|strong="H7761"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w*: \w That|strong="H1768"\w* if \w any|strong="H3606"\w* whosoever, shall alter \w this|strong="H1836"\w* commandment, \w a|strong="H7761"\w* beam be taken \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*. \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w set|strong="H7761"\w* up, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* be nailed upon \w it|strong="H5922"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* be confiscated.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* may \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* hath caused \w his|strong="H7972"\w* \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7932"\w* \w there|strong="H8536"\w*, \w destroy|strong="H2255"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* kingdoms, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* shall put \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* resist, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w destroy|strong="H2255"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*. \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w have|strong="H0576"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H0576"\w* \w diligently|strong="H0629"\w* complied \w with|strong="H0426"\w*.

\w So|strong="H0116"\w* \w then|strong="H0116"\w* Thathanai, \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* country \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* Stharbuzanai, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H7972"\w* counsellors \w diligently|strong="H0629"\w* \w executed|strong="H5648"\w* \w what|strong="H1768"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* commanded.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1868"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1868"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w prospered|strong="H6744"\w* \w according|strong="H4481"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* \w the|strong="H1868"\w* prophecy \w of|strong="H0426"\w* Aggeus \w the|strong="H1868"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5029"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* Zacharias \w the|strong="H1868"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* Addo: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* they \w built|strong="H1124"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w finished|strong="H3635"\w*, \w by|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1868"\w* commandment \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1868"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w by|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1868"\w* commandment \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1868"\w* \w Persians|strong="H6540"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* finishing \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God, \w until|strong="H5705"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w third|strong="H8532"\w* \w day|strong="H3118"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w month|strong="H3393"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w Adar|strong="H0144"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w sixth|strong="H8353"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w reign|strong="H4437"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w children|strong="H1123"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*, \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w priests|strong="H3549"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3879"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w children|strong="H1123"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* captivity kept \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w dedication|strong="H2597"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w with|strong="H0426"\w* \w joy|strong="H2305"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1005"\w* they \w offered|strong="H7127"\w* \w at|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w dedication|strong="H2597"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, a, \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* calves, two \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w rams|strong="H1798"\w*, \w four|strong="H0703"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w lambs|strong="H0563"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w for|strong="H5922"\w* a \w sin|strong="H2409"\w* \w offering|strong="H7127"\w* \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w* \w twelve|strong="H6236"\w* he \w goats|strong="H5796"\w*, according \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w number|strong="H4510"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7625"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3792"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w set|strong="H6966"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w priests|strong="H3549"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* their \w divisions|strong="H6392"\w*, \w and|strong="H3792"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3879"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* their courses \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* works \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w as|strong="H1768"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w written|strong="H3792"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w book|strong="H5609"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4873"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* captivity \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* phase, \w on|strong="H6453"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fourteenth \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w purified|strong="H2891"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*: \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w clear|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* phase \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* captivity, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w themselves|strong="H2891"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* captivity, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* themselves \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* filthiness \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w joyful|strong="H8055"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* help \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
